scripts.ci: npm test && start-server-and-test start-local-env http://localhost:3000/check end2EndTest-local-env
scripts.prepare: cp ./_templates/template-test-secrets.js ./_end2endTests/config && mv ./_end2endTests/config/template-test-secrets.js ./_end2endTests/config/test-secrets.js && cp ./_templates/template-secrets.js . && mv ./template-secrets.js ./secrets.js && cp ./_templates/template-serverless-config.json . && mv ./template-serverless-config.json ./serverless-config.json
